{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.01715v1", "title": "The asymptotic behavior of the first Robin eigenvalue with negative
  parameter as $p$ goes to $+\infty$", "summary": "In this paper, we want to study the asymptotic behavior of the first
$p$-Laplacian eigenvalue, with Robin boundary conditions, with negative
boundary parameter. In particular, we prove that the limit of the
eigenfunctions is a viscosity solution for the infinity Laplacian eigenvalue
problem.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-02T13:22:40Z"}
